name: .CLKV File Extension
summary: Learn about .CLKV files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A CLKV file is a vocabulary set file created by Clicker Communicator, an iPad app used to help students with speech and language challenges. The file contains a set of words, colors, and photos organized in grids.

content: Clicker Communicator comes with pre-made CLKV sets but also allows users to create their own. The app comes with over 24,000 symbols and 2,500 pictures that you can choose from to fit your vocabulary set topic.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
